subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous kingdom was ruled by Maharana Pratap?
question_hi: महाराजा प्रतिपूर के लिए कौन बड़ा पवन महाराष्ट्र है?
explanation_en: Maharana Pratap was a notable king of the Mewar kingdom, which was ruled by the Kachchhwaha dynasty. Amber, on the other hand, was ruled by the Kachchhwaha dynasty but not directly associated with Maharana Pratap.
